derivation: from a compound of G3173 (μεγαλαυχέω) and (to boast;
strongs_def: akin to G837 (μεγαλαυχέω) and G2744 (μεγαλαυχέω)); to talk big, i.e. be grandiloquent (arrogant, egotistic)
outline:
1. to boast
  2. to bear one's self loftily in speech or action, to boast great things (when used in conjunction with Strong's 3173).
